revision.text: As of version 0.9.8, there are fourteen distinct types of Pokéball, each with their own bonuses and acquisition methods. Note that some balls can only be obtained by trading Berries with the Johto Berry Master. The types of Berries demanded in exchange vary from day to day. Also, every ball can be gotten as [[Dungeons|Dungeon]] loot, except [[Masterball]] and [[Beastball]].
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
